comment.body:
> [xls](#comment_1_1GCsPG7BQcZtvrAjxKfEyixWTdKMMRSVH3): how is it possible to use tags

you can just copy  index.html js/all.js css/all.css dbschema.json  from this site
(in your ZeroNet folder data/19k2nhubaYsDJNPHL6iNs3D2K9Mgj66P4R/) to your 
ZeroBlog folder ,then you got all these functions. (you may need to restart zeronet
and reload your blog's data)

or you can checkout source at https://github.com/zeronetscript/ZeroBlog/tree/toc_by_tag.
